      • deleteFiles

        public static boolean deleteFiles(String path,
                                  String[] files)
        Deletes each file in files which is under path. It does not delete directory.
        参数:
        path -
        files -
        返回:
        true if and only if all the files are successfully deleted; false otherwise.
